location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, Writing from Bombay, to John Wedderburn, Military Accountant, Bombay

mods.abstract: This letter concerns an advance made by William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, on behalf of Lieutenant McDonald. Bruce responds to John Wedderburn's request that he state whether the amount is to be accounted for by the Military or the Marine Department.
